description.$t:
My Story
CHAOS is a sweet boy who was dumped at a shelter by his previous owners through no fault of his own. When his time was up, we did not hesitate to take him. Chaos is 5 years old and weighs 42 pounds. He is house trained, walks well on a leash, and sits on command; what a good boy! He would do best in a home with no children. He is neutered, up to date with shots, microchipped, and heartworm tested negative

My Story
DAISY is a sweet senior girl who found herself at the shelter as a stray on 1/12. Her owner of 10 years was contacted, but sadly they did not come and get her. We heard about Daisy and quickly took her into our program. She is a 10 year old and 53 pound sweet senior girl. She is quiet and calm and knows how to sit and stay. DAISY is up to date on her shots, spayed, microchipped and has been treated for heartworms. 

Will you please open your heart for this special senior?

Introducing ARLO, our 6 yr old male Yorkie mix!  This little fellow is crate and house trained, good with other dogs and is best around children over 8 yrs of age.  He likes to play and added bonus, he likes to snuggle, too!

Meet Claire, our stunning,   30 lb., 2 year old terrier mix. She is submissive, extremely friendly, and trusting in familiar surroundings. Claire enjoys toys, loves to plays fetch (like a pro), and is great with other dogs.  She is an amazing, well behaved dog who has a lot to offer a wonderful family.  All she needs is a little time to adjust to them and her new home. Cat compatibility unknown. Fenced yard required. $200.

Meet Rio!  Rio is a 3 yr old Terrier mix (best guess) who weighs only 20 lbs.   His foster said that he is built a bit like a Greyhound (in that he is a little taller but slim and light in weight).  This guy is very good with dogs and cats, crate and potty trained, too!!  He needs a calmer environment so a home with no children is best.

Meet Riyah, our BEAUTIFUL Great Dane/mix who is just 2 yrs old and a 56 lb. bundle of love!  This girls loves affection and actually snuggles and hugs her humans.  She is great with kids and other dogs.  She can be shy around strangers.  She is house and crate trained and ready to find a family as beautiful as she is!   What a keeper!!

Bella is a 10 month old German Shepherd who loves to play and lounge around the house. Bella would do better with someone who is home more often than not. She is incredibly sweet and is just a puppy at heart. She does not do well with small dogs.

Bonni is a 3-4 mo old, 15 lbs, mixed breed female. She is spayed, up to date on vaccines (including rabies vaccine), microchipped, and current on both heart-worm and flea prevention.

Bonni is being fostered by a family with three large dogs and three cats; she loves them all. She is outgoing, friendly, playful, eager to please, and is great on leash. Afternoon naps, playing with her foster siblings, and snuggling on the couch are just a few of her favorite things to do. 

Bonni is wonderful on car rides and will make a great walking or running partner.  She will do best with an active family in a home with a large fenced yard, other animals, and/or children.

Cody is an absolutely adorable 13 lb 6 yr old Schipperke/Pomeranian mix.  His former family dumped him at a local shelter and we did not hesitate to pull him,  This is a really neat little dog!  Getting out of the scary pound turned him into a completely different dog.  He is extremely affectionate  and he loves to play with his dog toys. He is house trained and would be fine with the option of walking or a fenced yard. By the way, did I say he loves toys.   He gets along with some dogs but not all and  would probably be happiest as an only dog .......with lots of toys!  He does expect full furniture privileges!~  We suspect some children weren't too nice to him in his former life so he is looking for a home without small kids.

Cody is neutered, vaccinated, heartworm negative and on prevention and microchipped!

To access the home page for our group, click on Southern Comfort Maltese Rescue which will take you to the map page.  Below the map is our logo and the link to click on to access adoption forms, contact info or to donate. ALL DONATIONS ARE TAX DEDUCTIBLE.


Adoption Donation: $150.00

Your dream dog!!

Little Karmin is a 5star cutie pie purebred Maltese who is 10yrs of age and weighs 7lbs.  This sweetie loves to cuddle and is HOUSE TRAINED!  Karmin does not have accidents in her crate and always goes when taken outside. Karmin walks very well on a leash and does not bark when she encounters other walkers and gets along well with her foster sisters. She comes when called and is showing a willingness to learn commands like sit and stay. There are no cats in the foster household, so we do not know how she would react around them.

Karmin was diagnosed with a collapsing trachea but has responded very well to medication so she rarely coughs. It is important that she always walks with a harness as a collar would aggravate the condition. She is scheduled for dental surgery and we expect she will lose a few teeth. A diet of soft food will be necessary so that she can continue to get the nutrition she needs.

If you are looking for an inquisitive and cuddly companion, then Karmin is your girl! 

She is currently being fostered in Woodstock, GA




NOTE: SCMR DOES NOT adopt to homes with children under the age of 10 years or homes with Electric Fences

Out-of-state adoptions are possible; however, the approved adoptive home is responsible for making the necessary arrangements to pick up their new little one.

Ling Ling is a little lady with a big personality. She loves to play and sunbathe.  Also is a huge fan of the water!!  Ling Ling is about 6 months old and working hard on potty training. She needs a fenced in yard with an active family that is going to give her the attention and exercise she needs. .

Meet Carrie, our beautiful 2 yr old female mix.  This sweet girl is already crate and potty trained, spayed, up-to-date on shots and HW negative. .  She is very good with kids and other dogs and would be a great addition to any family!

You can fill out an adoption application online on our official website.Baby Girl is a mix, approx 2, housetrained, black and white we believe she has some pointer in her. She can jump up 6 foot high. She is spayed, up to date on shots, super sweet just wants a loving home. She is medium energy, approximately 35-45 lbs, Heartworm negative, does not dig or try and jump a fence.

For info text/call Maria at 404-630-8515 or email her at jmpartnersccac@gmail.com.

You can fill out an application on our website:http://www.adoptapet.com/wearerescuega

Please note: We adopt within an hour of Metro Atlanta and we do not allow out of state adoptions. 7/7/18 6:27 PM

You can fill out an adoption application online on our official website.Katie is a Pit Bull/Chocolate Lab mix, approximate age 3. Loves to run and play so someone who likes to take long walks or has a fenced yard would be perfect. She is Heartworm negative, fully vetted, spayed and needs a home. She is dog friendly (been around medium and large dogs has not been around small dogs) and been around children. She has a lot of energy and just wants someone to love her. Approximate weight 45-55 lbs. Does not dig or try and jump a fence.

For info text/call Maria at 404-630-8515 or email her at jmpartnersccac@gmail.com

You can fill out an application on our website: http://www.adoptapet.com/wearerescuega

Please note: We adopt within an hour of Metro Atlanta and we do not allow out of state adoptions. 7/7/18 6:27 PM

You can fill out an adoption application online on our official website.Do you love large dogs? Snowball is a 4 year old Bernese Mountain dog and Husky mix available for adoption.She is sweet, calm and heartworm negative and just wants a home to call her own. Due to the heat we shaved them down but their hair will be growing back in the next couple of weeks. She is the largest at 110 lbs.

She is dog, people and child friendly. Our volunteer cannot say enough about these dogs - "these are the best dogs you will ever meet. So gentle and loving."

For info text/call Maria at 404-630-8515 or email her at jmpartnersccac@gmail.com. You can fill out an application on our website: http://www.adoptapet.com/wearerescuega

All of our dogs are fixed, fully vetted and microchipped.
Please note: We adopt within an hour of Metro Atlanta and we do not allow out of state adoptions.

We would like to request people with Husky experience as potential adopters.

She was raised with Loki another Siberian Husky shown in the photo section. He is brown, tan and white, 7 years old and has one brown eye and one blue eye. They like to be outside and come in at night to sleep in their kennels. They have been raised around children too.

We would like to request people with Husky experience as potential adopters. We offer a discount on the adoption fee if you adopt Zoe and Loki together. They may be adopted separately to the right home.

You can fill out an adoption application online on our official website.We are looking to re-home Mama and her boy Trouble (who is really no trouble just a rascal as a kitten) They have been home raised with love and need to stay together as Mother and Son. She is about 7 yrs old and he is about 5 yrs old. Fully vetted. Strictly inside cats only.

Their owner had to go into a nursing home these two are VERY lonely since she left. We would like to find them a new family to love them. Special adoption fee to adopt them together.

For more info - please call or text Kristen at 770-846-2011. You can email her at: butlerkristen@yahoo.com

Click here to fill out an adoption application on : Simple Link

Please note: We DO NOT adopt outside of a 100 mile radius from Atlanta and we DO NOT allow out of state adoptions. 7/7/18 6:27 PM

You can fill out an adoption application online on our official website.Hi my name is Roxy (DOB around 8/8/16) Female DSH brown tabby; I am a full figure girl who loves adventure. I absolutely love other kitties and love to play. My favorite past times include taking selfies with your cell phone when youâre not looking and IPads . . . I LOVE IPads! Guess you could say Iâm a techie girl. Iâm still trying to figure out why Iâm not yet adopted like my siblings; after all Iâm the most outgoing and fun one of the bunch but this rescue group has been helping me for over a year now. Iâm not sure about dogs, however am willing to give it a shot as long as they are fun loving too. Even with all of my playfulness I would prefer a home with older children, and of course another kitty, yes another kitty/ if possible. I am spayed, microchipped, combo tested negative for FIV/FELV, had my rabies and feline distemper vaccines. If you would like to meet me please let me know. I really want a home of my own. Xoxo, Roxy

For more info - please call or text our cat adoption coordinator Tracy at 770-617-9441 or email her at thenschel93@comcast.net.

You can fill out an adoption application online on our official website.Hi my name is Tyson, Iâm a Male DSH/ white and orange tabby and my birthday is around July 1st, 2014 so they think Iâm around 3 Â½ years old. I have had a rough life until I was rescued off the streets. When I was found I was only walking on 3 legs due to a very bad infection and a broken toe. I also had pneumonia from a very bad bite wound from someone not playing very nice. I LOVE to play and love other kitties, however I havenât officially met a dogs yet so Iâm not sure if I like them, if theyâre nice I just might though. Once I gain your trust Iâm intensely devoted and thereâs no going back. I look into your eyes and into your soul. I just want to be loved and to be kept safe. I do like to be dressed up with toys on my head and pose for photos as you can see. Because Iâve been bullied my entire life, I would prefer to be in a home with older children and adults. I have been neutered, combo tested negative for FIV/FELV, microchipped, and had my first set of vaccines. Please send me a message if you would like to meet me. Xoxo, Tyson (or Ty Ty for short).

For more info - please call or text our cat adoption coordinator Tracy at 770-617-9441 or email her at thenschel93@comcast.net.

Please note: We DO NOT adopt outside of a 100 mile radius from Atlanta and we DO NOT allow out of state adoptions. 7/7/18 6:27 PM

Martini is a 7 wk old mixed breed puppy. She is available for adoption on June 30th and will be spayed, current on vaccinations for age, and microchipped before going to her new home. 

Martini was raised in a foster home with her mom and siblings. She is outgoing, playful and full of energy. She has a fabulous temperament and is full of curiosity. She will do best in a home with an active family/owner. Fenced yard preferred.
Kodi loves to be held and snuggled more than play with his toys. ?
Kendall is unbelievably sweet and loves to cuddle. She gives tons of kisses and is already doing great at sit and shake.
